articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Largest asteroid to pass by Earth this year will be moving unusually fast - CNN
articles.description: Asteroid 2001 FO32 is the largest asteroid that has been predicted to make a close approach of Earth this year. It will zip by from a safe distance on Sunday, according to NASA.
